attributes.action: lobby the EU to allow free movement of motor vehicle,s & motorcycle,s within EU borders without importation duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently most EU countries impose customs duty on your car or motorcycle when you move from one EU country to another. Others allow 6 months then charge up to 200% custom duty.
Where,s the free movement of goods with regards to personnal motor vehicle,s.
